mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNMTGINFO SET MTG_NM=#{mtgNm}, MTG_MTR_CN=#{mtgMtrCn}, MTG_SN=#{mtgSn}::NUMERIC, MTG_CO=#{mtgCo}::NUMERIC, MTG_DE=REPLACE(#{mtgDe},'-',''), MTG_PLACE=#{mtgPlace}, MTG_BEGIN_TM=#{mtgBeginTime}, MTG_END_TM=#{mtgEndTime}, CLSDR_MTG_AT=#{clsdrMtgAt}, READNG_BGNDE=REPLACE(#{readngBeginDe},'-',''), READNG_AT=#{readngAt}, MTG_RESULT_CN=#{mtgResultCn}, MTG_RESULT_ENNC=#{mtgResultEnnc}, ETC_MATTER=#{etcMatter}, MNGT_DEPT_ID=#{mngtDeptId}, MNAER_ID=#{mnaerId}, MNAER_DEPT_ID=#{mnaerDeptId}, MTG_AT=#{mtnAt}, NONATDRN_CO=#{nonatdrnCo}::NUMERIC, ATDRN_CO=#{atdrnCo}::NUMERIC WHERE MTG_ID=#{mtgId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.MTG_ID, A.MTG_NM, A.MTG_MTR_CN, A.MTG_SN, A.MTG_CO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MTG_DE, 'YYYYmmdd'),'YYYY-mm-dd') MTG_DE, A.MTG_PLACE, A.MTG_BEGIN_TM, A.MTG_END_TM, A.CLSDR_MTG_AT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.READNG_BGNDE, 'YYYYmmdd'),'YYYY-mm-dd') READNG_BGNDE, A.READNG_AT, A.MTG_RESULT_CN, A.MTG_RESULT_ENNC, A.ETC_MATTER, A.MNGT_DEPT_ID, (SELECT ORGNZT_NM FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = A.MNGT_DEPT_ID) MNGT_DEPT_NM, A.MNAER_ID, (SELECT EMPLYR_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.MNAER_ID) MNAER_IDS, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.MNAER_ID) MNAER_NM, A.MNAER_DEPT_ID, (SELECT ORGNZT_NM FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = A.MNAER_DEPT_ID) MNAER_DEPT_NM, A.MTG_AT, A.NONATDRN_CO, A.ATDRN_CO, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM COMTNMTGINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.MTG_ID = #{mtgId}

SELECT A.MTG_ID, A.MTG_NM, A.MTG_MTR_CN, A.MTG_SN, A.MTG_CO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MTG_DE, 'YYYYmmdd'),'YYYY-mm-dd') MTG_DE, A.MTG_PLACE, A.MTG_BEGIN_TM, A.MTG_END_TM, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM COMTNMTGINFO A WHERE 1=1

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNMTGINFO ( MTG_ID, MTG_NM, MTG_MTR_CN, MTG_SN, MTG_CO, MTG_DE, MTG_PLACE, MTG_BEGIN_TM, MTG_END_TM, CLSDR_MTG_AT, READNG_BGNDE, READNG_AT, MTG_RESULT_CN, MTG_RESULT_ENNC, ETC_MATTER, MNGT_DEPT_ID, MNAER_ID, MNAER_DEPT_ID, MTG_AT, NONATDRN_CO, ATDRN_CO, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{mtgId}, #{mtgNm}, #{mtgMtrCn}, #{mtgSn}::NUMERIC, #{mtgCo}::NUMERIC, REPLACE(#{mtgDe},'-',''), #{mtgPlace}, #{mtgBeginTime}, #{mtgEndTime}, #{clsdrMtgAt}, REPLACE(#{readngBeginDe},'-',''), #{readngAt}, #{mtgResultCn}, #{mtgResultEnnc}, #{etcMatter}, #{mngtDeptId}, #{mnaerId}, #{mnaerDeptId}, #{mtnAt}, #{nonatdrnCo}::NUMERIC, #{atdrnCo}::NUMERIC, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId}, NOW(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
